basics.name: Mateo Echeverri
basics.label: Product Analytics and Data Science
basics.summary: Engineering Physicist turned Data Scientist and Product Analyst with a passion for leveraging data to drive business impact. Experienced in causal modeling, A/B testing, and statistical analysis, with a strong track record of optimizing marketplace dynamics and product decisions. Adept at bridging the gap between business strategy and data science, working with large-scale datasets to uncover insights and drive actionable outcomes. Always eager to learn, innovate, and tackle complex challenges at the intersection of technology, economics, and human behavior.

work.name: Delivery Hero
work.summary: The biggest food delivery apps conglomerate in the world
highlights: Evaluated 110+ experiments, driving an incremental GMV impact of ~€42M
Enabled reliable concurrent experiments, quadrupling experimentation velocity within the search team.
Developed a quantitative framework to estimate financial opportunities, influencing the 2025 search product strategy.
Built a common data layer for performance dashboards & A/B test evaluations, enhancing data coherence and self-serve capabilities.
Led workshops and knowledge-sharing sessions for leadership, product teams, and stakeholders.
Causal modelling for different interventions in the marketplace that could not be A/B tested.

work.name: Rappi
work.summary: Top 10 YC startup. On demand delivery and financial services for Latin America
highlights: Leveraged data from over 150K partner brands and 10M users across 9 Latin American countries to derive actionable insights.
Developed an innovative metric to predict vendor success in the marketplace, informing strategic decisions.
Led the implementation of an inverse ETL process, integrating analytical insights into the data warehouse for seamless external access.
Collaborated with business and product teams to co-create features and prioritize them through data-driven analysis.
Designed and deployed a segmentation model to optimize partner brand targeting and enhance marketplace strategies.

work.name: Protección - SURA Asset Management
work.summary: Colombian branch of the biggest pension fund conglomerate in Latin America
highlights: Utilized demographic and financial data from over 4M clients to drive strategic insights.
Assisted in the migration from a legacy data platform to a cloud-native data warehouse on Google's BigQuery.
Developed and productionized a system for analyzing 60K monthly call recordings, incorporating both a voice-to-text and a digital signal processing model to enhance service quality.
Leveraged GIS software to analyze client geographic data, optimizing the placement of offices and service partners nationwide.
Collaborated with actuaries to build a machine learning model for pricing an insurance policy valued at $250M USD annually.

work.name: Globant
work.summary: Software development and digital transformation consulting for global clients.
highlights: Developed consumer-facing iOS applications for a range of high-profile clients.
Implemented behavioral tracking using Adobe Analytics across multiple Disney iOS apps to enhance user insights.
Built a minimum viable product for an analytics-driven in-app messaging system deployed across various Disney consumer applications.
Transitioned key features in the Disney Parks app from MVC to VIPER architecture, improving scalability and maintainability.

work.name: EAFIT University
work.summary: Applied optics research group from one of Colombia's leading research universities.
highlights: Designed and built custom hardware to control actuators in laboratory experiments.
Developed software interfaces for specialized optics equipment, enhancing experimental data collection.
Collected and analyzed data from experimental setups to validate research hypotheses.
